title: Secrets of interpreting pigeons in a dream with a person, according to Ibn Sirin, about good and evil

preview.html: To meet the interpretation of the bather in a dream with the human being by Imam Muhammad Ibn Sirin, in detail, dreams and visions are defined as a group of interconnected situations and scenes that a person sees during his sleep, which may not be logical or interconnected, but in reality they seem very logical and realistic. Dreams always carry in their manifestations many Of the symbols and connotations of things in the dreamer’s reality, so people seek to know the interpretations of their dreams to know what the future holds for them and to learn about the interpretation of bathing with a person in one dream. Follow us on the following lines from the encyclopedia. Interpretation of bathing in a dream with a person. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing bathing in a dream is Praiseworthy things in general, which indicates a person’s deep desire to get rid of sins and misdeeds. Also, seeing a shower with hot water means that the dreamer will soon get rid of his sins and sorrows, but if the water is so hot that the dreamer’s body cannot handle it, it means that he will fall In misfortune and great weakness. In the dream of a dreamer who takes a shower in front of another person by completely removing his clothes, his vision indicates that he is exposed to some problems or crises or that he is exposed to something, which reveals his hidden things and prompts many to stay away from him. And if the dreamer sees himself bathing with another person, fully clothed without taking them off, then his vision is a sign of the worries and burdens that he carries within himself due to his exposure to some financial crises or dealing with some disparities. And if the rich person actually sees this vision, then His vision indicates that he will be exposed to a scandal or bankruptcy and a complete loss of his money. And if he sees the sinner committing a sin against himself, bathing in front of another person or in a public place, then his vision shows that his sins are exposed in front of the public, which makes people stay away from him and sever their relationship with him. Bathing with someone in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried woman bathing in front of a stranger she does not know, and naked without clothes, means that she will be exposed to some attempts at harassment, or she will be exposed in front of some people because of her sins or misbehavior. And her involvement in suspicious relationships. But if an unmarried woman sees that she is bathing in front of a stranger wearing her clothes, then her vision indicates that she has escaped the attempts of her bad companions to distort her reputation or someone’s attempt to rape her, God forbid. And when an unmarried woman sees herself bathing in front of someone she knows, This indicates that she will soon marry someone she knows before, and one of her relatives may soon become her fiancé. Interpretation of a dream about bathing in front of people for a married woman: A married woman who sees herself bathing in front of her husband somewhere shows the strength of the feelings of love and tenderness that unite her and the intensity of her attachment to him. But if a woman sees If a married woman bathes in front of a stranger, this means that she has cheated on her husband, God forbid, and someone exposes her. She feels very afraid and wants to repent and undo that. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about bathing in front of people for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman bathing with her clothes on in front of the public is one of the visions worthy of praise.

Dreams always carry in their manifestations many symbols and connotations of things in the dreamer's reality, so people seek to know the interpretations of their dreams to know what the future holds for them and to learn about the interpretation of bathing with a person in a single dream, follow us on the following lines of the encyclopedia. Interpretation of bathing in a dream with a person Ibn Sirin explained that seeing bathing in a dream is one of the things that are generally commendable, indicating a person's deep desire to get rid of sins and transgressions. Also, seeing bathing with hot water means that the dreamer will soon get rid of his sins and sorrows, but if the water is so hot that the dreamer's body cannot bear it, this means that he will fall into a calamity and great weakness. In the dream of the dreamer who bathes in front of another person by completely undressing, his vision indicates that he is exposed to some problems or crises or that he is exposed to something, which reveals his hidden and prompts many to stay away from him and cut off their relationship with him, and God knows best. And if the dreamer sees himself bathing with another person, fully dressed without taking them off, then his vision is a sign of the worries and burdens he carries in himself due to his exposure to some financial crises or dealing with some disparities. And if the rich person actually sees this vision, then his vision indicates that he is exposed to a scandal or bankruptcy and a complete loss of his money. And if the sinner sees himself guilty, bathing in front of another person or in a public place, then his vision shows that his sins are exposed to the public, which makes people stay away from him and cut off their relationship with him. Bathing with someone in a dream for a single woman Seeing an unmarried woman bathing in front of a stranger she does not know, and naked without clothes, means that she will be exposed to some attempts at harassment, or exposed in front of some because of her sins or bad behavior. And her involvement in suspicious relationships. As for if an unmarried woman sees that she is bathing in front of a stranger wearing her clothes, her vision indicates that she has escaped the attempts of her bad companions to tarnish her reputation or someone trying to rape her, God forbid. And when an unmarried woman sees herself bathing in front of someone she knows, this indicates that she will soon marry someone she knew before and one of her relatives may soon become her fiancé. Interpretation of a dream about bathing in front of people for a married woman A married woman who sees herself bathing in front of her husband somewhere shows the strength of the feelings of love and tenderness that unite her and the intensity of her attachment to him. As for if a married woman sees that she is bathing in front of a stranger, this means that she has betrayed her husband, God forbid, and someone has exposed her, so she feels very afraid and wants to repent and back down from that. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about bathing in front of people for a pregnant woman Seeing a pregnant woman bathing in her clothes in front of the public is one of the visions worthy of praise

title: Interpretation of examination in a dream - the meaning of examination in a dream

preview.html: The exam is for the single girl, the married woman, the pregnant woman, the divorced woman, and the married or unmarried man. He either fails or passes, and the exam is postponed. And more about Ibn Sirin. Examining the dream according to Ibn Sirin. The exam is from the scholarship and his success means passing the exam and vice versa. The dream of not being able to answer indicates what is called stopping the condition. And the teacher in the dream shows commitment with permission. God because the teacher shows God's closeness to you. The dream of examination in a dream varies depending on the condition of the person who is dreaming, as some can see the delay in examination as one of the things of bad skin, but in reality it can sometimes be a sign that it is. Too late for a private home, family or family, or missed opportunities to solve tragedies and problems. In the permissible way, if a person dreams that he is passing exams in his dream, this means that he will undergo a new experience and he will be very afraid of it. If a person dreams that he has exams that he is late for, this means that he has some problems in his life that require him to compete and challenge in order to apply and achieve them. If one has an exam and cannot find the location of the exam, it means that he has many innate feelings that show fear. People who dream of exams do not face failure in real life. These dreams stem from fear and anxiety that others may disappoint you. Some interpreters said that seeing an exam in a dream is a sign of evil, and that there are some reprehensible matters facing a person in his life, and the exam may mean that Almighty God has given the servant an exam and is waiting for it. Being able to be patient and answer this difficult exam in a dream, may mean that the person is experiencing difficulties in prayer and getting closer to God. He stated that when you see that you are in an exam and cannot answer, this indicates that something bad has happened to you. Examination in a dream generally shows what God is testing you in your life, and your inability to answer shows that you need to get closer to God than you are in this. Success in exams shows endurance in difficult subjects. Exams are considered one of the most stressful experiences in our lives, and therefore it is a symbolic story that there is a stressful experience that you are going through and you want to achieve achievements in it. When you dream that you are in an exam, the first question you should ask yourself after waking up is What made me feel the same anxiety and tension that I felt when I was sitting for the exam. When you dream that you arrived late to the exam hall or that you were unable to find the exam location, this means that there are some things in your real life that require you to challenge, perform well, and compete, and these are innate feelings. When you dream that you performed well in exams, this indicates achieving excellence in your life, whether you are acquiring a profession or mastering new activities. Dreaming of being late for exams. Delaying an exam in a dream means complete failure in the process of achieving progress in the field of work and delay in achieving a distinguished and successful future, which It may cause you tension and pressure, which means

title: Interpretation of seeing a silver ring in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a silver ring in a dream: Seeing a silver ring in a dream indicates the arrival of goodness, abundance, and abundant money to the one who sees the vision by the command of God Almighty. If the dreamer sees that he has lost the silver ring in his dream, then this dream is not good, it indicates illness or death, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees that he is wearing a silver ring This vision indicates that the dreamer will soon separate from his wife. If the dreamer washes the silver ring in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer has good qualities and performs charitable works. Interpretation of giving a silver ring in a dream: Ibn Shirin says that with a vision of giving a silver ring to someone in a dream, It means that the dreamer will hear good news. If an unmarried woman sees that someone gave her a silver ring in her dream, this dream means that she will obtain a high position. If the dreamer sees that he is giving a ring to the king in the dream, this indicates prestige, power and reaping a lot of profits And gains. Get a ring made of silver by a person in a dream, showing the humiliation and humiliation that he will be exposed to in his work. Interpretation of a dream about a golden ring for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman with a ring in a dream indicates the arrival of kindness, abundant nourishment, and abundant money to the owner of the vision. Seeing a pregnant woman wearing a ring from Silver in a dream means that her life will change for the better in the coming period by the command of God Almighty. If a pregnant woman sees a ring in her dream, this dream indicates the approaching date of her birth, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Dreaming of a silver ring in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates joys, happy occasions, and good news, with permission. God.Interpretation of an unmarried woman’s silver ring in a dream. Ibn Sirin says that seeing an unmarried girl wearing a ring with a clove in a dream is a sign that she will be engaged soon. Seeing a free girlIf in a dream he wears a ring with a clove, then he will be able to overcome all the problems he faces. If An unmarried woman saw a silver ring in her dream. This vision indicates that she will hold an important position in her workplace. Al-Usaimi believes that seeing an unmarried woman wearing a silver ring in a dream indicates her good reputation among people. A gift of a silver ring in a dream, Ibn Sirin believes. Seeing a silver ring received as a gift from someone you know indicates the arrival of kindness and abundant sustenance. If a divorced woman sees that a man gives her a gift ring with a green clove in a dream, this symbolizes a close marriage. If a married woman sees that someone gives her a silver ring as a gift in her dream, this means That she will return to her ex-husband. Seeing a pregnant woman with a silver ring in a dream indicates that she will give birth to a child and vice versa. Interpretation of a dream about a silver ring with a carnelian lobe in a dream: Seeing a silver ring with a carnelian lobe on the dreamer indicates the strength and authority that the dreamer enjoys. Seeing a ring with a carnelian lobe on the dreamer indicates the strength and authority that the dreamer enjoys. Silver with a small agate pod in the dreamer’s dream indicates that he will have good offspring and that God is the Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing an expensive agate ring means that the fortuneteller will obtain a high position in his workplace with permission.

title: Interpretation of a dream about money for a single woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing her collecting money shows that she kept a big secret in her life during this time, and in the following lines of the Instant Translator website, we will explain in detail how to see money in a dream. Interpretation of seeing money in a dream for a single girl Seeing an unmarried woman taking money from a stranger, this explains the fact that some people stand with her in her life’s hardships. And if she asks her father for money, this is a sign that she is suffering from a problem and asks him for help. Whether a single woman wants to save money, this is an indication of her commitment to all matters in her life. An unmarried girl who hides money in a dream indicates the great happiness in which she lives. Seeing money thrown on the ground is a sign of a lot of gossip in her life, and God knows best. And if the money is torn paper money, this is a sign of poverty and humiliation that she will experience at this time. Also, taking money from someone she knows shows that she is trying to reach this person in her life. An unmarried woman who takes money from her mother explains the great closeness she lives with her mother. And coins in a dream indicate the problems and misfortunes that a single woman sees or experiences. See also: Interpretation Dream of giving money to childrenInterpretation of seeing money in a dream for a married womanA married woman who takes money from her husband in a dream indicates that she will face a big problem in his job. If she gives her husband money, this indicates her great love for him and her preservation of her home and his home. The dreamer who asks a stranger to give her money is a sign that she is in financial distress. Like taking money from someone in a dream, it indicates her success in her practical life. A married woman tears up bills, a sign of the psychological disturbances she is currently experiencing in her life. Likewise, a married woman giving money to her children is an indication of the problems they are currently experiencing. Gold coins in a dream are a sign of the abundance of good and great sustenance in the dreamer's life. If she is looking for money, this indicates her extreme poverty at this time and her need for money. A married woman who saves money in a dream is a sign of her fear for her family and husband. Interpretation of seeing money in a dream for a divorced womanSeeing a divorced woman bringing money in a dream shows her ambitions and goals in life. A divorced woman who gets money from her ex-husband explains the happy life she lives. If she gives For the needy, money indicates the end of her problems and troubles. And torn paper money in a dream is a sign of a big problem that she will face and experience. And giving a divorced woman money to someone she knows in a dream indicates her great closeness to him. If she takes money from her father in a dream, this indicates her father’s great fear of her. A divorced woman who sees coins in a dream indicates problems and troubles in her life. And divorced women who look at money indicate her thinking about her life and herself. And the final dreamer who saves money, this is an indication of the

title: Interpretation of a dream about my niece’s engagement in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about my sister’s engagement in a dream. If you are asking about the interpretation of a dream about my sister’s engagement in a dream, we present below the interpretations of scholars and commentators, not personal interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about my sister’s daughter’s engagement in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my sister’s daughter’s engagement in a dream could be an indication of the daughter’s engagement, and God knows best in the unseen. If a married man sees my sister’s daughter’s engagement in a dream, this may be evidence of God’s good news, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl sees my sister’s daughter’s engagement, this may indicate her engagement, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my nephew’s death in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about my nephew’s death in a dream It could be a sign of a new emotional relationship, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees his nephew dying, this may be evidence of a new beginning, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl sees her nephew dying in a dream, this may indicate a new job, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. You both know that seeing death His nephew may indicate new beginnings, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my nephew who passed exams in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my nephew passing exams in a dream could be a sign of excellence, and God knows best. When I see my nephew succeeding, this can lead to excellence and success, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If A married woman saw that her sister’s son is succeeding, so this may be a sign of promotion at work, God willing. Seeing an unmarried girl succeeding her sister’s son may also indicate success at work, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a sick nephew in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a sick nephew in a dream can be evidence. On difficult times, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees his nephew sick in a dream, this may be a sign of anxiety, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees her sick nephew in a dream, she can express her attachment to him, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees her sick nephew In a dream, this may be evidence of anxiety, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my nephew getting married to me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my nephew approaching me in a dream could indicate the strong relationship that unites them, and God knows the unseen. When the dreamer sees his nephew attached to him in a dream, this could be evidence. On the existence of strong relationships, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. If a married woman sees her sister’s son having sex with him, this may be a sign that she is offering advice, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of a dream about incest in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Almighty God created marriage as a year of life so that people would enjoy multiplying and preserving the human race, but in light of the sins and taboos that have spread, the incest group appears, which God has forbidden to write, and it is one. It is one of the most terrifying dreams that a person sleeps with, and he searches for clear evidence and its explanations. Therefore, we present to you in detail everything related to a dream about incest in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about sexual intercourse for a single woman: “Intercourse in a dream,” for an unmarried girl, indicates an improvement in her financial, familial, and emotional condition. And her success in her work, and the goodness and happiness that she will obtain in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about sexual intercourse for a married woman: If a married woman sees that her husband is having intercourse with her, this indicates love, tenderness, and understanding between them and the stability of her married life. title: 50- Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing a dead person preparing food in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing dead people bringing food in a dreamSeeing dead people bringing food in a dream comes from strange visions that await their owner in great confusion and make him have an urgent desire to learn their interpretation and know the signs they carry.Seeing dead people bringing foodIn the interpretation of a dream about a dead person bringing food, this vision indicates that there is Good news is on the way to the dreamer, and if he gives him some food to eat, the vision shows a lot of money that will come to him in reality. But if he eats with the dead person, he will have to travel far to build his future. If he is a single young man, he travels to work abroad to marry a girl he loves, but he is sad. Too incapable of doing so. To do this for her is to propose marriage now. But if the dead person in the dreamer’s dream is one of his relatives, then preparing food may mean that the dreamer will face a health problem, but this will not last long. In the dream interpretation of the dead person, he brings food and no one is with him, this means that he needs To the one who gives alms for his soul. Some interpreters said that the vision is an indication of a loss that the dreamer is going through and that he should prepare to face some bad things that will happen to him in the near future. Seeing dead people is food in a dream of unpleasant visions in any case, but if He invited the owner of the vision to eat with him, then there is a benefit that the dreamer will get, and if the deceased’s father died and he was satisfied with him. Seeing the dead bringing food to Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said: If seeing the dead person in a dream while preparing food because of his hunger, it is necessary to inform the deceased’s family of this Vision, he may have money that he did not pay before his death, or he may have. There is a need for someone to pray and ask for forgiveness. This dream also indicates the desire of the deceased to visit his grave with his family and relatives, so the dream is an invitation to them. If the deceased is preparing food in the dreamer’s house, then there is an occasion in which many people will meet, and if the dreamer is an unmarried girl, then it may take place. Her engagement soon. If the deceased prepares food and presents it to the fortuneteller, it indicates the good that will return to the fortuneteller, and it may be a new project through one of the deceased’s acquaintances. The dream also indicates the benefit that the dreamer receives, and if she is unmarried, it may indicate her marriage to one of the deceased’s relatives. If the deceased eats food in front of the fortuneteller, this is a warning to him that there are those around him who are trying to trap him. Seeing the dead brings food in a dream to freedom. There are many indications of this vision in a woman’s dream. If the deceased smiled while preparing the food, she will have very good days. If she wants a promotion at work, she will thank her for her excellence and diligence at work. It appears to her that her wish will soon be fulfilled and that she will marry a person who has many of the advantages that she aspired to. If the deceased was depressed, then there are many difficulties that she will face, whether on the way to achieving her practical or social ambitions, and she must be distinguished by courage and determination to overcome them successfully. The girl For an unmarried woman, when she eats food with a dead person in a dream,

title: Interpretation of a dream about the same person by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams for the same person: Seeing someone in a dream has more than one meaning explained by scholars, especially if seeing this person repeatedly in a dream indicates a series of changes that will happen to the dreamer, and in the following the rest of the indicators of repetition are explained. Dreaming with the same person...so follow usInterpretation of the repetition of a dream with the same personSeeing someone in a dream repeatedly indicates many interpretations, as psychologists have talked about. In the event that the dreamer sees in a dream a repetition of a dream with the same person, it is interpreted that the dreamer associates him with him A strong relationship, which can be maintained over the years. When a person sees in a dream that he dreams of the same person more than once, this indicates that the dreamer shows that he loves that person and is attached to him. If the dreamer sees in a dream repeatedly seeing a person and there is a dispute between them in reality, then this It indicates that the dreamer is worried about his actions and is not safe from his evil, and this makes him think about him a lot. Some scholars believe that seeing the same person over and over again in a dream indicates that the dreamer feels sadness and worries that increase his need. If you see someone you know more than once in a dream This is an indication of his desire to see you and restore the relationship between you to its previous state, and God knows best. When you see a dream that repeats itself with the same person who is looking at it, this is a sign that the dreamer is exposed to some bad things in his life and this increases his feeling of sadness and anxiety. Interpretation of a dream about the same person The Person by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin narrated that seeing the same person repeating the dream in a dream means that there is a major crisis between the eunuchs and that things are not good between them. This dream also indicates that the dreamer is in trouble because of this person and that he is not loyal to him but rather conspires against him. If you see the repetition of seeing a familiar face in a dream, this means that the dreamer and this person will have a strong and stable relationship and will have more than one good thing as desired. In the event that the dreamer sees someone he does not know in the dream and this is repeated often, it is interpreted that the dreamer is in a state of confusion and dispersion. Because of something happening in his life, and God knows best. The Imam explained that repeating a vision in a dream is a sign that the dreamer feels a state of tension and sadness that dominates his life and delays his progress. But if the dreamer sees a specific person whom he sees repeatedly at a wedding or a happy occasion, this means that Good things will happen to the dreamer in his life and that there is good news that will come to him soon. In addition, this dream contains a lot of good news about ease and comfort after hardships. Interpretation of repeating a dream with the same person for single peopleRepeating a dream with the same person in the dream indicates that the dreamer He loves that person and his affection and that he has a good relationship with him. If a girl sees in a dream a specific person more than once, this is a sign that she is thinking about him and wants to get close to him, and that she has been able to obtain an excellent position in her life. When she repeats the dream about a young man she knows, This means that the relationship between them is very good and that she loves him very much and hopes that God will be her share in life

title: Interpretation of a dream about walking on beach sand

preview.html: Today we will examine with you from our translated website one of these visions that express thoughts in the subconscious mind and conversations of the soul and heart, so stay with us. Interpretation of the vision of walking on the sand of the beach in a dream for one girl. Interpretation of the dream of walking on the sand of the beach in one dream. She is looking for the right partner in her life and hopes To meet him soon to be comfortable with him, and God knows best. Walking on the soft sand of the beach in a dream. It is interpreted as frivolity in meetings of friends, and a feeling of relief after revealing things that exhaust the soul. Seeing a dream that you are running on the sand of the beach. Indicates achieving the desired and achieving Goals and serious effort to build a safe future for the dreamer. Walking on the sand of a turbulent and rebellious sea in a dream. It indicates that the girl is going through major disagreements and crises with her lover, and the issue between them can reach abandonment and alienation. You may be interested: Interpretation of seeing the coast in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing a woman walking On the sand of the beach in a dream for a married womanWalking on the sand of the beach in a dream of a married woman. It indicates the end of the disputes between her and her husband and the return of stability once again in her life. Walking with the husband in a dream on the sand of the calm sea. Good news for the owner of the vision of an imminent pregnancy if she deserves it. In addition to that, it is happiness and understanding between the two sides. Sleeping on the beach sand in a dream relieves worries, God willing. Sleeping on the beach also symbolizes the ease of her life and recovery from illness. If a woman sees that the sand she walks on in a dream is dirty and full of dirt, this is interpreted as Committing sin and disobedience, and God knows best. Interpretation of the vision of walking on the sand of the beach in a dream about the man and its meaning. Walking quickly on the sand of the beach in a dream is good news for any person that he will harm his enemies and completely remove them from his life so that he can enjoy peace and tranquility in his family. And whoever sees in his dream that he is walking on Beach sand means that he will obtain a specific thing. He is a lover of goodness and righteous deeds, and God knows best. Seeing some sea creatures on the beach sand in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is distinguished by generosity and chivalry, and always helps others, and God knows best. Crawling on the beach sand in a dream indicates an obsession with collecting money without Exaggeration. It has also been said that crawling in the sand is a corruption of religion. The meaning of seeing walking on beach sand in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Walking on wet beach sand in a pregnant woman’s dream. It is a good sign that the pains are over, and the pain of the months of pregnancy ends well and peacefully. If the sand Dry and warm in a dream, and the dreamer walks on it. She may stumble or postpone her birth for some time, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman dreams that her husband takes her to the beach. This is evidence that there is great affection, compassion, and love between them. Some interpretive scholars say that walking on the beach sand in A dream. A sign of the birth of a calm boy with beautiful and attractive features. Read also: Walking on water in a dream. Interpretation of the vision of walking on the beach sand in a dream for young people and its meaning. Walking on the beach sand in a dream for young people is a beautiful vision that carries kindness.

title: I dreamed that I was drinking magic

preview.html: I dreamed that I drank magic in a dream through the website Vision roy2a.com. Magic is one of the harmful things that some people do to take revenge or get something, and there are many types, including the magic of separation spouses and the magic of married couples. Insanity and others, and today through this article we will present to you I dreamed that I was drinking magic. For the great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us according to the condition of the dreamer, whether she is single, married, or pregnant. I dreamed that I was drinking magic in a dream. Seeing yourself drinking magic in a dream indicates To the many evil people around him and their many plans behind his back. Putting magic in a drink in a dream indicates a person close to the dreamer who does many bad things to him. Read also: Interpretation of seeing magic in a dream Interpretation of seeing magic in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained that the dreamer saw in his dream That he is under the influence of magic indicates that the dreamer will face some misfortunes in the coming days, and God knows best. Seeing resistance to magic in a dream indicates that the monarch is a wise and wise person who has the ability to overcome any difficulties in his life. A magician in a dream indicates the dreamer’s trip outside his homeland to enjoy and spend time Enjoyable. Seeing people practicing magic in a dream indicates a change in the fortuneteller’s conditions and conditions for the better in the coming period. If the dreamer sees that he is bewitching people in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will make some mistakes in his life in the coming period. Read also: Interpretation of the letter M In a dream, the interpretation of seeing magic in a dream for a single woman. Seeing only magicians in a dream indicates that she is a girl with a weak mind and faith and makes many mistakes, and God knows best. The magician in one dream indicates the presence in her life of someone who constantly lies and deceives her, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing magic in a dream for a married woman, seeing a married woman Magic in a dream: It says that she is unable to bear the responsibility of her family and perform the duties assigned to her towards her children and husband. Magic in a married woman’s dream, which indicates that many machinations and bad things are being planned by those close to her, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing magic in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant witch in a dream. The dream indicates that she thinks a lot about the birth process and what may happen to her, and that during this period she feels anxious and stressed. Magic in a pregnant woman’s dream. It indicates a person with bad morals in her life who is always jealous of her and wishes her harm. Read also: I dreamed that I was drinking Zamzam water, seeing magic. Buried magic in a dream: Seeing buried magic in a dream indicates the dreamer’s distance from his Lord and committing many bad deeds in his life. Buried magic in a dream can show what the fortuneteller says about people with wrong and not good words. Seeing buried magic in a dream also indicates that the dreamer obtained a lot of money in a way. Illegal. Breaking the spell in a dream indicates the dreamer’s return to God and his repentance for the sins and disobedience he committed. Read also: I dreamed that I was wearing a white dress. We are happy to see the reception of your dreams about
